Name: Samir Mukherjee
Comments: MAKAUT, formarly known as WBUT, basically the apex committee and educational controling body of private engineering colleges in West Bengal, a huge university with all facilities, recently shifted to Kalyani.

Name: Seraj
Comments: West Bengal University Of Technology is still considered one of the best college to get an engineering degree. I would highly recommend this as a.engineering degree college because: 1) A wide range of engineering course offered. 2) Govt Engineering college and hence very affordable tuition fees. 3) Faculty and lab facilities are up to the mark. May notice best in class but one can manage. 4) In short of time it has Spacious campus, green, and provides opportunities to meet with interdisciplinary students. 5) Excellent environment and freedom for students. 6) Decent library facilities.

Name: Srimanta Saren
Comments: Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT), formerly West Bengal University of Technology (WBUT), is a Public state university located in Kolkata, India. Founded in 2000 and funded initially by the Government of West Bengal, MAKAUT provides facilities for the pursuit to degree and advanced-level courses in engineering, management and other professional areas through affiliated institutions and in-house departments. In 2019, new certification and diploma courses on Archaeology were launched.

Name: Al Mostafa Kamal
Comments: The government of West Bengal set up an Expert Committee on December 31, 1998 under the chairmanship of Ashesh Prasad Mitra to explore the necessity, field and scope for the establishment of an 'Engineering and Technology' university in the state of West Bengal. Following their review, they decided that existing and forthcoming engineering and technology colleges needed the guidance of a technological university for the inclusive growth and improvement of technological education.The proposition to set up West Bengal University of Technology (WBUT) was started by a committee in 1998; it formally came into existence on August 5, 2000. It started functioning with the assumption of office of the first vice chancellor on January 15, 2001 as a sequel to the promulgation of the West Bengal University of Technology Act 2000, under the West Bengal Act XV of 2000 passed by the West Bengal legislature and published in the Calcutta Gazette (Extraordinary) dated July 20, 2000. The Act contemplates a General Council, an Executive Council, an Academic Council, a Finance Committee and an Advisory Council as its regulatory and advisory bodies.The university in-house department first started with formerly IIIT-C (Indian Institute of Information Technology-Calcutta) and used to offer B.E. degree course in Information Technology.[2]The renaming of the university from West Bengal University of Technology to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, West Bengal in April 2015[3] led to agitation in the student community and across the colleges affiliated to the university[4]

Name: Sumit Kumar Ghosh
Comments: MAKAUT(MAULANA ABUL KALAM AZAD UNIVERSUTY OF TECHNOLOGY) formerly known as WBUT .This university shifted from saltlake sector 1 bf block 142 to haringhata jaguli . All B.Tech colleges are under this university .First of all ,to go makaut you need to go kalyani ( any local train from sealdah or any other station ) .Next you have to take a bus ride (27 no. "JAGULI" only because another 27 no bus there) . The charge for bus ₹13 & auto ₹12 . The university opens monday to friday closed (saturday &sun day closed).

Name: AMIT BHARTI SHAW
Comments: I am a cet phase 2 student in 2019. By mistake i deleted the sms in which password and application id was written. In their site in the FAQ section. It is written that we can reset our password by "forget password" option in applicant login. But there are no. such option.i have emailed them 3 days ago. But they didn't respond.
